channel.title: Have a question. plz read this and help me
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have a question, my question is the following:
How do i make myself the server owner, and how do i add things to the server if my computer doesnt even know that my server called "modscape.no-ip.org" exists. please help.....also...another thing...when i click on the "runserver" on my TestScape an error comes out saying that port 43594 is already in use...it says this..
"Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594- Port already in use?"
HOPE U GUYS HELP ME> THANKS.

item.title: Have a question. plz read this and help me
item.dc:creator: @Alphaspida Alphaspida
item.description:
@Alphaspida wrote:

to make yourself a server owner, go to the character files and click on yours. there will be playerrights-0. do playerrights-3 for owner, 2 for admin, 1 for mod.

it says port is already in use because you are already running a port and a computer can only run one port at a time, so you have to figure out what is already using it. im thinking you have the moparscape client up and clicked “start server”. dont click start server, just open the client and runserver then type in ur username and stuff

Read full topic
item.source: Have a question. plz read this and help me

item.title: Have a question. plz read this and help me
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Ok, I’m not too sure of the other ones, but for making urself owner, go to where u put ur source file, open it up, and open up characters folder. Then just find your name in there NOTE: It will only be in there if u have already logged in once on ur server. Then open up ur character’s folder, find player rights = and change the number to 0 for regular, 1 for mod, 2 for admin, 3 for owner, and 4 for admin with no crown. For example, it would look like: player rights = 3 That would be for u to be owner. And you maybe need to find the tut on putting PATH and CLASSPATH for when u try to start up ur server.

Read full topic
